Presentation.aboutThisWebsiteText:
Responsive i18n website crafted using Next.js. Tested with Testing Library.

I also tried TailwindCSS for fun.

Hosted on Google Cloud Platform.
Presentation.profileText: Passionate about my job, I strongly believe that clean code makes great and durable projects
Presentation.profileTitle: 上 級ソフトウェア開発者
Presentation.title: こんにちは！ステフェンです

backend.description:
I have extended experience in Java (especially the Spring stack) and NodeJs and common associated components/practices (message brokers, cache mechanisms, transaction management, etc.).

I love crafting a great backend architecture by finding the right software design and tools depending on the project.
backend.label: Backend

craftmanship.description:
Crafting a software is also about the Developer Experience and having tailored made.

Recently I'm deeply aligned with the ideas from Accelerate and Product-mode approaches.

This includes so many concepts and practices like pair/mob programming, TDD, Clean Architecture, up to more advanced ones like Design Driven Development or Continuous Delivery...
craftmanship.label: Craftmanship

frontend.description:
Through the years I mainly used React, Angular and Ember (using Typescript or not).

Accessibility (a11y), responsive design are practices that I find very important.

I'm used to working with CSS modules, CSS pre-processors, and design systems, however designing the UX/UI is not always my area of expertise.
frontend.label: Frontend

platforms.description:
I'm a big fan of Docker containers. I am used to AWS and OpenShift platforms (with or without Kubernetes).

Back in the day, I was running apps On-Premises. Also I'm an everyday Linux user (Kubuntu).
platforms.label: Platforms

en.description: Proficient ; TOEIC: 905/990 + lived and worked in Australia
en.label: English
